cakes.name: London cheescake
cakes.book: How to be a domestic goodess
cakes.author: Nigella Lawson
cakes.description: This is one of the best sort of recipes — a family hand-me-down. My paternal grandmother instructed me in the art of adding the final layer of sour cream, sugar and vanilla towards the end of the cooking time: and it's true, it does finish it off wonderfully.

for the base: 75 grams unsalted butter (melted or very soft)

cakes.name: Carrot cake
cakes.author: autorka strony 'Moje Wypieki'
cakes.description: My favourite recipe for homemade carrot cake. This cake is easy to make, incredibly moist, spiced, and topped with a rich, creamy Philadelphia frosting. It is made with walnuts (or pecans), cinnamon, and pineapple. You can prepare this cake without fancy equipment – just bowls, a whisk and a spatula. And it’s the best cake ever – tried and tested many times!

for the base: 1/3 cup vegetable oil or walnut oil

for creamy frosting: 300 g Philadelphia cream cheese, at room temperature
1 tsp vanilla extract or vanilla paste
